content: Moving to our North American enterprise business, in the third quarter, we secured a $37 million contract to the financial services company to upgrade their networking equipment and extend their SD-WAN network service out to 2028, a $4.4 million order of a leading retailer for equipment upgrade and extension of their Hughes-provided SD-WAN network, a contract with a new quick service restaurant chain for their corporate stores, covering network equipment and services, and additional contracts and deployments for customers in the retail, petroleum and energy markets.
